name: Bullet Space (NeverPhuc)
description:
Theme: easy to play hard to master

Hello, Bullet Space is a top down shooter game, this game is inspired by arcade classic "asteroid". At first, i wanted to make this bullet hell game, but turned out i didn't have the time to make the bullet pattern that's good enough for this prototype, so i just make more enemy and asteroid for you guys, player, to kill and evade  :)

This game is about drifting, shooting and evade enemy or asteroid, are you brave enough to kill them all? or just run away like a coward? 

This game is made in 2 days. I am a solo developer, for this game jam i need to shave many features, soon I will update this game and make it more playable and enjoyable.

-Phuc

How To Play:

Earn Xp by Killing 

Kamikaze spaceship : 2 xp

Gunner SpaceShip : 3 xp

asteroid : 1 xp

W - move 

Mouse - direction

Mouse 1 - shoot

Space - Dash
